@graph.caption: a hand dipping a carrot stick into a small bowl of jackfruit buffalo dip with cucumber and carrot sticks on the side

@graph.name: Jackfruit Buffalo Dip - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This jackfruit buffalo dip is perfect for your next movie night or party! It's super easy to make, packed with flavor, incredibly creamy, and so comforting!

@graph.name: Jackfruit Buffalo Dip
@graph.description: This jackfruit buffalo dip is perfect for your next movie night or party! It's super easy to make, packed with flavor, incredibly creamy, and so comforting! People will be begging you for the recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  cup unsweetened almond or soy milk
1/2 cup Frank's Red Hot Buffalo sauce
2 cans young green jackfruit in brine or water

recipeInstructions.text: First rinse the jackfruit and cut off the core. With your fingers or a fork shred the jackfruit.
recipeInstructions.name: First rinse the jackfruit and cut off the core. With your fingers or a fork shred the jackfruit.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cashews, the unsweetened soy or almond milk, the nutritional yeast, the garlic and onion powder, the frozen dill, frozen parsley, and salt and pepper into a highspeed blender. Process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the cashews, the unsweetened soy or almond milk, the nutritional yeast, the garlic and onion powder, the frozen dill, frozen parsley, and salt and pepper into a highspeed blender. Process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the blended cashews sauce into a bowl. Add the vegan cream cheese, the Frank's Red Hot Buffalo sauce, and the frozen parsley and dill to the cashews sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the blended cashews sauce into a bowl. Add the vegan cream cheese, the Frank's Red Hot Buffalo sauce, and the frozen parsley and dill to the cashews sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the shredded jackfruit and stir well. Either serve the dip cold or preheat your oven to 350 °F and bake it for 10-15 minutes until it's heated through.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the shredded jackfruit and stir well. Either serve the dip cold or preheat your oven to 350 °F and bake it for 10-15 minutes until it's heated through.
